title: Plasticity in the Central Nervous System (TEFC)
brief_description: Shows three contemporary research approaches to neuronal plasticity in the adult. Approach one is the investigation of naturally regrowing neuronal tissue in the olfactory system. Approach two is nerve recovery after experimental lesioning, and approach three is the long term potentiation of neuronal stimulation
